If you're more interested in a post-apocalyptic survival story with thrilling action and a touch of drama, "Planet Terror" is an excellent choice. The ragtag group of survivors fighting the infected will leave you on the edge of your seat.

If you're intrigued by a movie with a unique blend of artistry and commercial appeal, "Alex in Wonderland" is a must-see. The fantastical world created by the director will leave you with a lot to think about.
